results.name: The Fairly OddParents: Breakin' da Rules
Ecco the Dolphin: Defender of the Future
Star Wars Episode I: Battle for Naboo
Dragon Ball Z: Idainaru Dragon Ball Densetsu

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1 (32 or 64 bit)
  • Processor: 2.4ghz Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 260 GTS or Radeon HD 4850 - 512 MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1 (32 or 64 bit)
  • Processor: 2.4GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 460 GTX / Radeon 5770 - 1 GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM320MB, 1280×720
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Support for PCM playback through DirectSound
  • Additional Notes: Windows Media Player 9 equivalent or higher
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO 2.66GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM512MB, 1280×720
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Support for PCM playback through DirectSound
  • Additional Notes: Windows Media Player 9 equivalent or higher

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 960, equivalent or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP and newer
  • Processor: Athlon 2 X3 450
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce EN9600 GT
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP and newer
  • Processor: AMD fx6300
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750ti
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Fedora 25, Ubuntu 16.04, SteamOS, Mint 18
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8600 / Radeon equivalent (2009 era)

Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8600 / Radeon equivalent (2009 era)
  • Storage: 550 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: XP
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8600 / Radeon equivalent (2009 era)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8
  • Processor: Pentium III 800MHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 32MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game can function not properly on Windows 10
